thread.section_title: The Ampersand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super service
thread.title_full: Super service - Review of The Ampersand Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: aprilsbhoy
title: Super service
text:
Outstanding service from a truly great team of people, make you feel valued and welcome.
Restaurant and bar are superb but special thanks to reception and concierge , people make places and everyone you meet here will make you happy you stayed and looking forward to return.
Rooms are small but perfectly formed, has everything you need for a short city break and represents amazing value for this level of comfort and location.
